ayah: الٓرۚ كِتَٰبٌ أُحۡكِمَتۡ ءَايَٰتُهُۥ ثُمَّ فُصِّلَتۡ مِن لَّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ خَبِيرٍ
ayah_translit: alif-lam-ra kitabun uh'kimat ayatuhu thumma fussilat min ladun hakimin khabirin
ayah_english: Alif Lam Ra (This is) a Book are perfected its Verses moreover explained in detail from the One Who (is) All-Wise All-Aware

ayah: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ
ayah_translit: alla ta'budu illa al-laha innani lakum min'hu nadhirun wabashirun
ayah_english: That Not you worship but Allah Indeed I am to you from Him a warner and a bearer of glad tidings

ayah: وَأَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ يُمَتِّعۡكُم مَّتَٰعًا حَسَنًا إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى وَيُؤۡتِ كُلَّ ذِي فَضۡلٖ فَضۡلَهُۥۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٖ كَبِيرٍ
ayah_translit: wa-ani is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yumatti'kum mata'an hasanan ila ajalin musamman wayu'ti kulla dhi fadlin fadlahu wa-in tawallaw fa-inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin kabirin
ayah_english: And that Seek forgiveness (of) your Lord and turn in repentance to Him He will let you enjoy a good for a term appointed And give (to) every owner (of) grace His Grace But if you turn away then indeed, I fear for you (the) punishment (of) a Great Day (of) a Great Day

ayah: وَأَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ يُمَتِّعۡكُم مَّتَٰعًا حَسَنًا إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى وَيُؤۡتِ كُلَّ ذِي فَضۡلٖ فَضۡلَهُۥۖ وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٖ كَبِيرٍ

ayah: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
ayah_translit: ila al-lahi marji'ukum wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: To Allah (is) your return and He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah_english: To Allah (is) your return and He (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ يَثۡنُونَ صُدُورَهُمۡ لِيَسۡتَخۡفُواْ مِنۡهُۚ أَلَا حِينَ يَسۡتَغۡشُونَ ثِيَابَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_translit: ala innahum yathnuna sudurahum liyastakhfu min'hu ala hina yastaghshuna thiyabahum ya'lamu ma yusirruna wama yu'linuna innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
ayah_english: No doubt! They fold up their breasts that they may hide from Him Surely when they cover (themselves) (with) their garments He knows what they conceal and what they reveal Indeed He (is) All-Knower of what (is in) the breasts

ayah: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ يَثۡنُونَ صُدُورَهُمۡ لِيَسۡتَخۡفُواْ مِنۡهُۚ أَلَا حِينَ يَسۡتَغۡشُونَ ثِيَابَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

ayah: ۞وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رِزۡقُهَا وَيَعۡلَمُ مُسۡتَقَرَّهَا وَمُسۡتَوۡدَعَهَاۚ كُلّٞ فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: wama min dabbatin fi al-ardi illa ala al-lahi riz'quha waya'lamu mus'taqarraha wamus'tawda'aha kullun fi kitabin mubinin
ayah_english: And not any moving creature in the earth but on Allah (is) its provision And He knows its dwelling place and its place of storage All (is) in a Record clear

ayah: ۞وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رِزۡقُهَا وَيَعۡلَمُ مُسۡتَقَرَّهَا وَمُسۡتَوۡدَعَهَاۚ كُلّٞ فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayah_translit: wama min dabbatin fi al-ardi illa ala al-lahi riz'quha waya'lamu mus'taqarraha wamus'tawda'aha kullun fi kitabin mubinin

ayah_english: And not any moving creature in the earth but on Allah (is) its provision And He knows its dwelling place and its place of storage All (is) in a Record clear

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَكَانَ عَرۡشُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلۡمَآءِ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۗ وَلَئِن قُلۡتَ إِنَّكُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ لَيَقُولَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayah_translit: wahuwa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin wakana arshuhu ala al-mai liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu amalan wala-in qul'ta innakum mab'uthuna min ba'di al-mawti layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
ayah_english: And He (is) the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six epochs and His throne was and His throne was on the water that He might test [you] which of you (is) best (in) deed But if you say Indeed, you (will be) resurrected after after [the] death surely would say those who disbelieved This is not This is not but a magic clear

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَكَانَ عَرۡشُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلۡمَآءِ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۗ وَلَئِن قُلۡتَ إِنَّكُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ لَيَقُولَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَكَانَ عَرۡشُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلۡمَآءِ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۗ وَلَئِن قُلۡتَ إِنَّكُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ لَيَقُولَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَخَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ مَّعۡدُودَةٖ لَّيَقُولُنَّ مَا يَحۡبِسُهُۥٓۗ أَلَا يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِيهِمۡ لَيۡسَ مَصۡرُوفًا عَنۡهُمۡ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: wala-in akharna anhumu al-'adhaba ila ummatin ma'dudatin layaqulunna ma yahbisuhu ala yawma yatihim laysa masrufan anhum wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: And if We delay from them the punishment for a time determined they will surely say What detains it No doubt (On) the Day it comes to them not (will be) averted from them and will surround them what they used (to) mock at [it] mock at [it]

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَخَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ مَّعۡدُودَةٖ لَّيَقُولُنَّ مَا يَحۡبِسُهُۥٓۗ أَلَا يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِيهِمۡ لَيۡسَ مَصۡرُوفًا عَنۡهُمۡ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنَّا رَحۡمَةٗ ثُمَّ نَزَعۡنَٰهَا مِنۡهُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَـُٔوسٞ كَفُورٞ
ayah_translit: wala-in adhaqna al-insana minna rahmatan thumma naza'naha min'hu innahu layausun kafurun
ayah_english: And if We give man a taste We give man a taste (of) Mercy from Us (of) Mercy from Us then We withdraw it from him indeed, he (is) despairing (and) ungrateful

ayah: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَٰهُ نَعۡمَآءَ بَعۡدَ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ ذَهَبَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتُ عَنِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَفَرِحٞ فَخُورٌ
ayah_translit: wala-in adhaqnahu na'maa ba'da darraa massathu layaqulanna dhahaba al-sayiatu anni innahu lafarihun fakhurun
ayah_english: But if We give him a taste (of) favor after hardship (has) touched him surely he will say Have gone the evils from me Indeed he (is) exultant (and) boastful

ayah_translit: wala-in adhaqnahu na'maa ba'da darraa massathu layaqulanna dhahaba al-sayiatu anni innahu lafarihun fakhurun

ayah: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: illa alladhina sabaru wa'amilu al-salihati ulaika lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
ayah_english: Except those who (are) patient and do the good deeds those for them (will be) forgiveness and a reward great

ayah: فَلَعَلَّكَ تَارِكُۢ بَعۡضَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَضَآئِقُۢ بِهِۦ صَدۡرُكَ أَن يَقُولُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ كَنزٌ أَوۡ جَآءَ مَعَهُۥ مَلَكٌۚ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ نَذِيرٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَكِيلٌ
ayah_translit: fala'allaka tarikun ba'da ma yuha ilayka wadaiqun bihi sadruka an yaqulu lawla unzila alayhi kanzun aw jaa ma'ahu malakun innama anta nadhirun wal-lahu ala kulli shayin wakilun
ayah_english: Then possibly you (may) give up a part (of) what is revealed to you and straitened by it your breast because they say Why not is sent down for him a treasure or has come with him an Angel Only you (are) a warner And Allah (is) on every thing a Guardian

ayah_translit: fala'allaka tarikun ba'da ma yuha ilayka wadaiqun bihi sadruka an yaqulu lawla unzila alayhi kanzun aw jaa ma'ahu malakun innama anta nadhirun wal-lahu ala kulli shayin wakilun

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِعَشۡرِ سُوَرٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦ مُفۡتَرَيَٰتٖ وَٱدۡعُواْ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: am yaquluna if'tarahu qul fatu bi'ashri suwarin mith'lihi muf'tarayatin wa-id'u mani is'tata'tum min duni al-lahi in kuntum sadiqina
ayah_english: Or they say He has fabricated it Say Then bring ten surahs like it fabricated and call whoever you can besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah if you are truthful

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ فَأۡتُواْ بِعَشۡرِ سُوَرٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦ مُفۡتَرَيَٰتٖ وَٱدۡعُواْ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

ayah: فَإِلَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلۡمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-illam yastajibu lakum fa-i'lamu annama unzila bi'il'mi al-lahi wa-an la ilaha illa huwa fahal antum mus'limuna
ayah_english: Then if not they respond to you then know that it was sent down with the knowledge of Allah and that (there is) no god except Him Then, would you (be) Muslims

ayah: فَإِلَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَكُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلۡمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُم مُّسۡلِمُونَ

ayah: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا نُوَفِّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فِيهَا وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يُبۡخَسُونَ
ayah_translit: man kana yuridu al-hayata al-dun'ya wazinataha nuwaffi ilayhim a'malahum fiha wahum fiha la yub'khasuna
ayah_english: Whoever [is] Whoever [is] desires the life (of) the world and its adornments We will repay in full to them (for) their deeds therein and they in it will not be lessened will not be lessened

ayah: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا نُوَفِّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فِيهَا وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يُبۡخَسُونَ

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا ٱلنَّارُۖ وَحَبِطَ مَا صَنَعُواْ فِيهَا وَبَٰطِلٞ مَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina laysa lahum fi al-akhirati illa al-naru wahabita ma sana'u fiha wabatilun ma kanu ya'maluna
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones who (is) not for them in the Hereafter except the Fire And (has) gone in vain what they did therein and (is) worthless what they used (to) do

ayah: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ وَيَتۡلُوهُ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۡهُ وَمِن قَبۡلِهِۦ كِتَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامٗا وَرَحۡمَةًۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ فَٱلنَّارُ مَوۡعِدُهُۥۚ فَلَا تَكُ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayah_translit: afaman kana ala bayyinatin min rabbihi wayatluhu shahidun min'hu wamin qablihi kitabu musa imaman warahmatan ulaika yu'minuna bihi waman yakfur bihi mina al-ahzabi fal-naru maw'iduhu fala taku fi mir'yatin min'hu innahu al-haqu min rabbika walakinna akthara al-nasi la yu'minuna
ayah_english: Then is he who is on a clear proof from his Lord and recites it a witness from Him and before it and before it (was) a Book (of) Musa (as) a guide and (as) mercy Those believe in it But whoever disbelieves in it among the sects then the Fire (will be) his promised (meeting) place So (do) not be in doubt about it Indeed, it (is) the truth from your Lord but most (of) the people (do) not believe

ayah_english: Then is he who is on a clear proof from his Lord and recites it a witness from Him and before it and before it (was) a Book (of) Musa (as) a guide and (as) mercy Those believe in it But whoever disbelieves in it among the sects then the Fire (will be) his promised (meeting) place So (do) not be in doubt about it Indeed, it (is) the truth from your Lord but most (of) the people (do) not believe

ayah_english: Then is he who is on a clear proof from his Lord and recites it a witness from Him and before it and before it (was) a Book (of) Musa (as) a guide and (as) mercy Those believe in it But whoever disbelieves in it among the sects then the Fire (will be) his promised (meeting) place So (do) not be in doubt about it Indeed, it (is) the truth from your Lord but most (of) the people (do) not believe

ayah_english: Then is he who is on a clear proof from his Lord and recites it a witness from Him and before it and before it (was) a Book (of) Musa (as) a guide and (as) mercy Those believe in it But whoever disbelieves in it among the sects then the Fire (will be) his promised (meeting) place So (do) not be in doubt about it Indeed, it (is) the truth from your Lord but most (of) the people (do) not believe

ayah: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ وَيَتۡلُوهُ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۡهُ وَمِن قَبۡلِهِۦ كِتَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامٗا وَرَحۡمَةًۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ فَٱلنَّارُ مَوۡعِدُهُۥۚ فَلَا تَكُ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّنۡهُۚ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡۚ أَلَا لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban ulaika yu'raduna ala rabbihim wayaqulu al-ashhadu haulai alladhina kadhabu ala rabbihim ala la'natu al-lahi ala al-zalimina
ayah_english: And who (is) more unjust than (he) who invents against Allah a lie Those will be presented before their Lord and will say the witnesses These (are) those who lied against their Lord No doubt (The) curse of Allah (The) curse of Allah (is) on the wrongdoers

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡۚ أَلَا لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًاۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَبُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡۚ أَلَا لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina yasudduna an sabili al-lahi wayabghunaha iwajan wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
ayah_english: Those who hinder from (the) way (of) Allah and seek (in) it crookedness while they in the Hereafter [they] (are) disbelievers

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجٗا وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَۘ يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ مَا كَانُواْ يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَمَا كَانُواْ يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika lam yakunu mu'jizina fi al-ardi wama kana lahum min duni al-lahi min awliyaa yuda'afu lahumu al-'adhabu ma kanu yastati'una al-sam'a wama kanu yub'siruna
ayah_english: Those not will be (able to) escape in the earth and not is for them besides besides Allah any protectors And will be doubled for them the punishment Not they were able (to) hear and not they used (to) see

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَۘ يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ مَا كَانُواْ يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَمَا كَانُواْ يُبۡصِرُونَ

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَمۡ يَكُونُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَۘ يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ مَا كَانُواْ يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَمَا كَانُواْ يُبۡصِرُونَ

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones who (have) lost their souls and lost from them (is) what they used (to) invent

ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones who (have) lost their souls and lost from them (is) what they used (to) invent

ayah: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ
ayah_translit: la jarama annahum fi al-akhirati humu al-akhsaruna
ayah_english: No doubt that they in the Hereafter [they] (will be) the greatest losers

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَأَخۡبَتُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati wa-akhbatu ila rabbihim ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna
ayah_english: Indeed those who believe and do good deeds and humble themselves before their Lord those (are the) companions (of) Paradise they in it (will) abide forever

ayah: ۞مَثَلُ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ كَٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡأَصَمِّ وَٱلۡبَصِيرِ وَٱلسَّمِيعِۚ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: mathalu al-fariqayni kal-a'ma wal-asami wal-basiri wal-sami'i hal yastawiyani mathalan afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: (The) example (of) the two parties (is) like the blind and the deaf and the seer and the hearer Are they equal (in) comparison Then will not you take heed

ayah: ۞مَثَلُ ٱلۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ كَٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡأَصَمِّ وَٱلۡبَصِيرِ وَٱلسَّمِيعِۚ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi inni lakum nadhirun mubinun
ayah_english: And verily We sent Nuh to his people Indeed I am to you a warner clear

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi inni lakum nadhirun mubinun

ayah: أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٖ
ayah_translit: an la ta'budu illa al-laha inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin alimin
ayah_english: That (do) not worship except Allah Indeed I [I] fear for you (the) punishment (of) a Day painful

ayah: فَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ مَا نَرَىٰكَ إِلَّا بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَنَا وَمَا نَرَىٰكَ ٱتَّبَعَكَ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَرَاذِلُنَا بَادِيَ ٱلرَّأۡيِ وَمَا نَرَىٰ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِن فَضۡلِۭ بَلۡ نَظُنُّكُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: faqala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi ma naraka illa basharan mith'lana wama naraka ittaba'aka illa alladhina hum aradhiluna badiya al-rayi wama nara lakum alayna min fadlin bal nazunnukum kadhibina
ayah_english: So said the chiefs (of) those who disbelieved from his people Not we see you but a man like us and not we see you followed [you] except those who [they] (are) the lowest of us immature in opinion immature in opinion And not we see in you over us any merit nay we think you (are) liars

ayah: فَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦ مَا نَرَىٰكَ إِلَّا بَشَرٗا مِّثۡلَنَا وَمَا نَرَىٰكَ ٱتَّبَعَكَ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَرَاذِلُنَا بَادِيَ ٱلرَّأۡيِ وَمَا نَرَىٰ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِن فَضۡلِۭ بَلۡ نَظُنُّكُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَءَاتَىٰنِي رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِهِۦ فَعُمِّيَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنُلۡزِمُكُمُوهَا وَأَنتُمۡ لَهَا كَٰرِهُونَ
ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi waatani rahmatan min indihi fa'ummiyat alaykum anul'zimukumuha wa-antum laha karihuna
ayah_english: He said O my people Do you see if I was on (the) clear proof from my Lord while He has given me mercy from Himself but (it) has been obscured from you should We compel you (to accept) it while you (are) averse to it averse to it

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَءَاتَىٰنِي رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِهِۦ فَعُمِّيَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنُلۡزِمُكُمُوهَا وَأَنتُمۡ لَهَا كَٰرِهُونَ

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ لَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مَالًاۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi la asalukum alayhi malan in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wama ana bitaridi alladhina amanu innahum mulaqu rabbihim walakinni arakum qawman tajhaluna
ayah_english: And O my people! not I ask (of) you for it any wealth Not (is) my reward except from Allah And not I am going to drive away those who believed Indeed they (will) be meeting their Lord but I see you (are) a people ignorant

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ لَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مَالًاۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ

ayah_english: And O my people! not I ask (of) you for it any wealth Not (is) my reward except from Allah And not I am going to drive away those who believed Indeed they (will) be meeting their Lord but I see you (are) a people ignorant

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ لَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مَالًاۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِطَارِدِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَٰكِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُمۡ قَوۡمٗا تَجۡهَلُونَ

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi man yansuruni mina al-lahi in taradttuhum afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And O my people! Who would help me against Allah if I drove them away Then will not you take heed

ayah_translit: wayaqawmi man yansuruni mina al-lahi in taradttuhum afala tadhakkaruna
ayah_english: And O my people! Who would help me against Allah if I drove them away Then will not you take heed

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ مَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِن طَرَدتُّهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

ayah_english: And O my people! Who would help me against Allah if I drove them away Then will not you take heed

ayah: وَلَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡ عِندِي خَزَآئِنُ ٱللَّهِ وَلَآ أَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ وَلَآ أَقُولُ إِنِّي مَلَكٞ وَلَآ أَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ تَزۡدَرِيٓ أَعۡيُنُكُمۡ لَن يُؤۡتِيَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ خَيۡرًاۖ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ إِنِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wala aqulu lakum indi khazainu al-lahi wala a'lamu al-ghayba wala aqulu inni malakun wala aqulu lilladhina tazdari a'yunukum lan yu'tiyahumu al-lahu khayran al-lahu a'lamu bima fi anfusihim inni idhan lamina al-zalimina
ayah_english: And not I say to you (that) with me (are the) treasures (of) Allah and not I know the unseen and not I say that I am an Angel and not I say for those whom look down upon your eyes never will Allah give them will Allah give them any good Allah knows best what (is) in their souls Indeed, I then (will be) surely of the wrongdoers

ayah_translit: wala aqulu lakum indi khazainu al-lahi wala a'lamu al-ghayba wala aqulu inni malakun wala aqulu lilladhina tazdari a'yunukum lan yu'tiyahumu al-lahu khayran al-lahu a'lamu bima fi anfusihim inni idhan lamina al-zalimina
ayah_english: And not I say to you (that) with me (are the) treasures (of) Allah and not I know the unseen and not I say that I am an Angel and not I say for those whom look down upon your eyes never will Allah give them will Allah give them any good Allah knows best what (is) in their souls Indeed, I then (will be) surely of the wrongdoers

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰنُوحُ قَدۡ جَٰدَلۡتَنَا فَأَكۡثَرۡتَ جِدَٰلَنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yanuhu qad jadaltana fa-aktharta jidalana fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina al-sadiqina
ayah_english: They said O Nuh! Indeed you disputed with us and you (have been) frequent (in) dispute with us So bring us what you threaten us (with) if you are of the truthful

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰنُوحُ قَدۡ جَٰدَلۡتَنَا فَأَكۡثَرۡتَ جِدَٰلَنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
ayah_translit: qala innama yatikum bihi al-lahu in shaa wama antum bimu'jizina
ayah_english: He said Only will bring it (on) you will bring it (on) you Allah if He wills and not you (are) one who (can) escape (it)

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

ayah: وَلَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ نُصۡحِيٓ إِنۡ أَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَنصَحَ لَكُمۡ إِن كَانَ ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يُغۡوِيَكُمۡۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wala yanfa'ukum nus'hi in aradttu an ansaha lakum in kana al-lahu yuridu an yugh'wiyakum huwa rabbukum wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
ayah_english: And (will) not benefit you my advice (even) if I wish to [I] advise [to] you if It was (Allah's) (It was) Allah's will to let you go astray He (is) your Lord and to Him you will be returned

ayah: وَلَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ نُصۡحِيٓ إِنۡ أَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَنصَحَ لَكُمۡ إِن كَانَ ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يُغۡوِيَكُمۡۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

ayah: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۖ قُلۡ إِنِ ٱفۡتَرَيۡتُهُۥ فَعَلَيَّ إِجۡرَامِي وَأَنَا۠ بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُجۡرِمُونَ
ayah_translit: am yaquluna if'tarahu qul ini if'taraytuhu fa'alayya ij'rami wa-ana barion mimma tuj'rimuna
ayah_english: Or (do) they say He has invented it Say If I have invented it then on me (is) my crime but I am innocent of what crimes you commit

ayah: وَأُوحِيَ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ أَنَّهُۥ لَن يُؤۡمِنَ مِن قَوۡمِكَ إِلَّا مَن قَدۡ ءَامَنَ فَلَا تَبۡتَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wauhiya ila nuhin annahu lan yu'mina min qawmika illa man qad amana fala tabta-is bima kanu yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: And it was revealed to Nuh That will never believe from your people except (those) who have already believed So (do) not (be) distressed by what they have been doing

ayah: وَأُوحِيَ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ أَنَّهُۥ لَن يُؤۡمِنَ مِن قَوۡمِكَ إِلَّا مَن قَدۡ ءَامَنَ فَلَا تَبۡتَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: wauhiya ila nuhin annahu lan yu'mina min qawmika illa man qad amana fala tabta-is bima kanu yaf 'aluna

ayah: وَٱصۡنَعِ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا وَلَا تُخَٰطِبۡنِي فِي ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِنَّهُم مُّغۡرَقُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-is'na'i al-ful'ka bi-a'yunina wawahyina wala tukhatib'ni fi alladhina zalamu innahum mugh'raquna
ayah_english: And construct the ship under Our Eyes and Our inspiration and (do) not address Me concerning those who wronged indeed they (are) the ones (to be) drowned

ayah: وَيَصۡنَعُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ وَكُلَّمَا مَرَّ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَأٞ مِّن قَوۡمِهِۦ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُۚ قَالَ إِن تَسۡخَرُواْ مِنَّا فَإِنَّا نَسۡخَرُ مِنكُمۡ كَمَا تَسۡخَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wayasna'u al-ful'ka wakullama marra alayhi mala-on min qawmihi sakhiru min'hu qala in taskharu minna fa-inna naskharu minkum kama taskharuna
ayah_english: And he was constructing the ship and every time passed by him (the) chiefs of his people they ridiculed [of] him He said If you ridicule us then we can ridicule you as you ridicule

ayah: وَيَصۡنَعُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ وَكُلَّمَا مَرَّ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَأٞ مِّن قَوۡمِهِۦ سَخِرُواْ مِنۡهُۚ قَالَ إِن تَسۡخَرُواْ مِنَّا فَإِنَّا نَسۡخَرُ مِنكُمۡ كَمَا تَسۡخَرُونَ

ayah: فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ
ayah_translit: fasawfa ta'lamuna man yatihi adhabun yukh'zihi wayahillu alayhi adhabun muqimun
ayah_english: And soon you will know (on) whom will come a punishment (that) will disgrace him and will descend on him a punishment lasting

ayah: فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٌ

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ قُلۡنَا ٱحۡمِلۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلّٖ زَوۡجَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ وَمَنۡ ءَامَنَۚ وَمَآ ءَامَنَ مَعَهُۥٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٞ
ayah_translit: hatta idha jaa amruna wafara al-tanuru qul'na ih'mil fiha min kullin zawjayni ith'nayni wa-ahlaka illa man sabaqa alayhi al-qawlu waman amana wama amana ma'ahu illa qalilun
ayah_english: Till when came Our command and overflowed the oven We said Load in it of every kind a pair two and your family except who has preceded against him the word and whoever believed And not believed with him except a few

ayah_english: Till when came Our command and overflowed the oven We said Load in it of every kind a pair two and your family except who has preceded against him the word and whoever believed And not believed with him except a few

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا وَفَارَ ٱلتَّنُّورُ قُلۡنَا ٱحۡمِلۡ فِيهَا مِن كُلّٖ زَوۡجَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا مَن سَبَقَ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ وَمَنۡ ءَامَنَۚ وَمَآ ءَامَنَ مَعَهُۥٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٞ

ayah_english: Till when came Our command and overflowed the oven We said Load in it of every kind a pair two and your family except who has preceded against him the word and whoever believed And not believed with him except a few

ayah: ۞وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡرٜىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: waqala ir'kabu fiha bis'mi al-lahi majraha wamur'saha inna rabbi laghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: And he said Embark in it in the name of Allah (is) its course and its anchorage Indeed my Lord (is) certainly Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: وَهِيَ تَجۡرِي بِهِمۡ فِي مَوۡجٖ كَٱلۡجِبَالِ وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٌ ٱبۡنَهُۥ وَكَانَ فِي مَعۡزِلٖ يَٰبُنَيَّ ٱرۡكَب مَّعَنَا وَلَا تَكُن مَّعَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wahiya tajri bihim fi mawjin kal-jibali wanada nuhun ib'nahu wakana fi ma'zilin yabunayya ir'kab ma'ana wala takun ma'a al-kafirina
ayah_english: And it sailed with them on the waves like mountains and Nuh called out and Nuh called out (to) his son and he was [in] apart O my son Embark with us and (do) not be with the disbelievers

ayah: وَهِيَ تَجۡرِي بِهِمۡ فِي مَوۡجٖ كَٱلۡجِبَالِ وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٌ ٱبۡنَهُۥ وَكَانَ فِي مَعۡزِلٖ يَٰبُنَيَّ ٱرۡكَب مَّعَنَا وَلَا تَكُن مَّعَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

ayah: قَالَ سَـَٔاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ جَبَلٖ يَعۡصِمُنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِۚ قَالَ لَا عَاصِمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَۚ وَحَالَ بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡمَوۡجُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُغۡرَقِينَ
ayah_translit: qala saawi ila jabalin ya'simuni mina al-mai qala la asima al-yawma min amri al-lahi illa man rahima wahala baynahuma al-mawju fakana mina al-mugh'raqina
ayah_english: He said I will betake myself to a mountain (that) will save me from the water He said (There is) no protector today from the Command of Allah the Command of Allah except (on) whom He has mercy And came (in) between them the waves so he was among the drowned

ayah: قَالَ سَـَٔاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ جَبَلٖ يَعۡصِمُنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِۚ قَالَ لَا عَاصِمَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَۚ وَحَالَ بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلۡمَوۡجُ فَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُغۡرَقِينَ

ayah: وَقِيلَ يَـٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: waqila yaardu ib'la'i maaki wayasamau aqli'i waghida al-mau waqudiya al-amru wa-is'tawat ala al-judiyi waqila bu'dan lil'qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: And it was said O earth! Swallow your water and O sky! Withhold And subsided the water and was fulfilled the Command And it rested on the Judi And it was said Away with the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَقِيلَ يَـٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah_english: And it was said O earth! Swallow your water and O sky! Withhold And subsided the water and was fulfilled the Command And it rested on the Judi And it was said Away with the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَقِيلَ يَـٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٞ رَّبَّهُۥ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ ٱبۡنِي مِنۡ أَهۡلِي وَإِنَّ وَعۡدَكَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَأَنتَ أَحۡكَمُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wanada nuhun rabbahu faqala rabbi inna ib'ni min ahli wa-inna wa'daka al-haqu wa-anta ahkamu al-hakimina
ayah_english: And Nuh called And Nuh called (to) his Lord and said O my Lord Indeed my son (is) of my family and indeed Your promise (is) true and You (are) the Most Just (of) the judges

ayah: قَالَ يَٰنُوحُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيۡسَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَمَلٌ غَيۡرُ صَٰلِحٖۖ فَلَا تَسۡـَٔلۡنِ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٌۖ إِنِّيٓ أَعِظُكَ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ
ayah_translit: qala yanuhu innahu laysa min ahlika innahu amalun ghayru salihin fala tasalni ma laysa laka bihi il'mun inni a'izuka an takuna mina al-jahilina

ayah_english: He said O Nuh! Indeed he (is) not of your family indeed [he] (his) deed (is) other than righteous so (do) not ask Me (about) what not you have of it any knowledge Indeed I admonish you lest you be among the ignorant

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنۡ أَسۡـَٔلَكَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞۖ وَإِلَّا تَغۡفِرۡ لِي وَتَرۡحَمۡنِيٓ أَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbi inni a'udhu bika an asalaka ma laysa li bihi il'mun wa-illa taghfir li watarhamni akun mina al-khasirina
ayah_english: He said O my Lord! Indeed I seek refuge in You that I (should) ask You what not I have of it knowledge And unless You forgive me and You have mercy on me I will be among the losers

ayah_translit: qala rabbi inni a'udhu bika an asalaka ma laysa li bihi il'mun wa-illa taghfir li watarhamni akun mina al-khasirina
ayah_english: He said O my Lord! Indeed I seek refuge in You that I (should) ask You what not I have of it knowledge And unless You forgive me and You have mercy on me I will be among the losers

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنۡ أَسۡـَٔلَكَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞۖ وَإِلَّا تَغۡفِرۡ لِي وَتَرۡحَمۡنِيٓ أَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

ayah: قِيلَ يَٰنُوحُ ٱهۡبِطۡ بِسَلَٰمٖ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَٰتٍ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَۚ وَأُمَمٞ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayah_translit: qila yanuhu ih'bit bisalamin minna wabarakatin alayka wa'ala umamin mimman ma'aka wa-umamun sanumatti'uhum thumma yamassuhum minna adhabun alimun
ayah_english: It was said O Nuh! Go down with peace from Us and blessings on you and on the nations from those with you But (to other) nations We will grant enjoyment then will touch them from Us a punishment painful

ayah: قِيلَ يَٰنُوحُ ٱهۡبِطۡ بِسَلَٰمٖ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَٰتٍ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَۚ وَأُمَمٞ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

ayah_english: It was said O Nuh! Go down with peace from Us and blessings on you and on the nations from those with you But (to other) nations We will grant enjoyment then will touch them from Us a punishment painful

ayah: قِيلَ يَٰنُوحُ ٱهۡبِطۡ بِسَلَٰمٖ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَٰتٍ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَۚ وَأُمَمٞ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

ayah: تِلۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ مَا كُنتَ تَعۡلَمُهَآ أَنتَ وَلَا قَوۡمُكَ مِن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَاۖ فَٱصۡبِرۡۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡعَٰقِبَةَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: til'ka min anbai al-ghaybi nuhiha ilayka ma kunta ta'lamuha anta wala qawmuka min qabli hadha fa-is'bir inna al-'aqibata lil'muttaqina
ayah_english: This (is) from the news (of) the unseen (which) We reveal to you Not you were knowing it you and not your people from before this So be patient indeed the end (is) for the God fearing

ayah: تِلۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهَآ إِلَيۡكَۖ مَا كُنتَ تَعۡلَمُهَآ أَنتَ وَلَا قَوۡمُكَ مِن قَبۡلِ هَٰذَاۖ فَٱصۡبِرۡۖ إِنَّ ٱلۡعَٰقِبَةَ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ
ayah_translit: til'ka min anbai al-ghaybi nuhiha ilayka ma kunta ta'lamuha anta wala qawmuka min qabli hadha fa-is'bir inna al-'aqibata lil'muttaqina
ayah_english: This (is) from the news (of) the unseen (which) We reveal to you Not you were knowing it you and not your people from before this So be patient indeed the end (is) for the God fearing

ayah: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۖ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا مُفۡتَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-ila adin akhahum hudan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu in antum illa muf'taruna
ayah_english: And to Aad (We sent) their brother Hud He said O my people! Worship Allah not (is) for you any god other than Him Not you (are) but inventors

ayah: يَٰقَوۡمِ لَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَجۡرًاۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِيٓۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayah_translit: yaqawmi la asalukum alayhi ajran in ajriya illa ala alladhi fatarani afala ta'qiluna
ayah_english: O my people! Not I ask you for it any reward Not (is) my reward except from the One Who created me Then will not you use reason

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا وَيَزِدۡكُمۡ قُوَّةً إِلَىٰ قُوَّتِكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yur'sili al-samaa alaykum mid'raran wayazid'kum quwwatan ila quwwatikum wala tatawallaw muj'rimina
ayah_english: And O my people! Ask forgiveness (of) your Lord then turn in repentance to Him He will send (from) the sky (rain) upon you (in) abundance and increase you (in) strength (added) to your strength And (do) not turn away (as) criminals

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا وَيَزِدۡكُمۡ قُوَّةً إِلَىٰ قُوَّتِكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ مُجۡرِمِينَ

ayah_english: And O my people! Ask forgiveness (of) your Lord then turn in repentance to Him He will send (from) the sky (rain) upon you (in) abundance and increase you (in) strength (added) to your strength And (do) not turn away (as) criminals

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰهُودُ مَا جِئۡتَنَا بِبَيِّنَةٖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَارِكِيٓ ءَالِهَتِنَا عَن قَوۡلِكَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu yahudu ma ji'tana bibayyinatin wama nahnu bitariki alihatina an qawlika wama nahnu laka bimu'minina
ayah_english: They said O Hud You have not brought us You have not brought us clear proofs and not we (will) leave our gods on your saying and not we (are) in you believers

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰهُودُ مَا جِئۡتَنَا بِبَيِّنَةٖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَارِكِيٓ ءَالِهَتِنَا عَن قَوۡلِكَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰهُودُ مَا جِئۡتَنَا بِبَيِّنَةٖ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَارِكِيٓ ءَالِهَتِنَا عَن قَوۡلِكَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: إِن نَّقُولُ إِلَّا ٱعۡتَرَىٰكَ بَعۡضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِسُوٓءٖۗ قَالَ إِنِّيٓ أُشۡهِدُ ٱللَّهَ وَٱشۡهَدُوٓاْ أَنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ
ayah_translit: in naqulu illa i'taraka ba'du alihatina bisuin qala inni ush'hidu al-laha wa-ish'hadu anni barion mimma tush'rikuna
ayah_english: Not we say except (that) have seized you some (of) our gods with evil He said Indeed, I [I] call Allah to witness [I] call Allah to witness and (you) bear witness that I am innocent of what you associate

ayah: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ
ayah_translit: min dunihi fakiduni jami'an thumma la tunziruni
ayah_english: Other than Him Other than Him So plot against me all together then (do) not give me respite

ayah: إِنِّي تَوَكَّلۡتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۚ مَّا مِن دَآبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِذُۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: inni tawakkaltu ala al-lahi rabbi warabbikum ma min dabbatin illa huwa akhidhun binasiyatiha inna rabbi ala siratin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: Indeed, I [I] put my trust upon Allah my Lord and your Lord (There is) not of a moving creature of a moving creature but He has grasp of its forelock Indeed my Lord (is) on a path straight

ayah: إِنِّي تَوَكَّلۡتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۚ مَّا مِن دَآبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِذُۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

ayah: إِنِّي تَوَكَّلۡتُ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۚ مَّا مِن دَآبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِذُۢ بِنَاصِيَتِهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayah_translit: inni tawakkaltu ala al-lahi rabbi warabbikum ma min dabbatin illa huwa akhidhun binasiyatiha inna rabbi ala siratin mus'taqimin
ayah_english: Indeed, I [I] put my trust upon Allah my Lord and your Lord (There is) not of a moving creature of a moving creature but He has grasp of its forelock Indeed my Lord (is) on a path straight

ayah: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفُ رَبِّي قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ وَلَا تَضُرُّونَهُۥ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَفِيظٞ
ayah_translit: fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum ma ur'sil'tu bihi ilaykum wayastakhlifu rabbi qawman ghayrakum wala tadurrunahu shayan inna rabbi ala kulli shayin hafizun
ayah_english: So if you turn away then verily I have conveyed to you what I was sent with [it] to you and will give succession my Lord (to) a people other than you and not you will harm Him (in) anything Indeed my Lord (is) on all things a Guardian

ayah: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفُ رَبِّي قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ وَلَا تَضُرُّونَهُۥ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَفِيظٞ

ayah_english: So if you turn away then verily I have conveyed to you what I was sent with [it] to you and will give succession my Lord (to) a people other than you and not you will harm Him (in) anything Indeed my Lord (is) on all things a Guardian

ayah: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُم مَّآ أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفُ رَبِّي قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ وَلَا تَضُرُّونَهُۥ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ حَفِيظٞ

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا هُودٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٖ
ayah_translit: walamma jaa amruna najjayna hudan wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wanajjaynahum min adhabin ghalizin
ayah_english: And when came Our command We saved Hud and those who believed with him by a Mercy from Us and We saved them from a punishment severe

ayah: وَتِلۡكَ عَادٞۖ جَحَدُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَصَوۡاْ رُسُلَهُۥ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
ayah_translit: watil'ka adun jahadu biayati rabbihim wa'asaw rusulahu wa-ittaba'u amra kulli jabbarin anidin
ayah_english: And this (was) Aad they rejected (the) Signs (of) their Lord and disobeyed His Messengers and followed (the) command (of) every tyrant obstinate

ayah: وَتِلۡكَ عَادٞۖ جَحَدُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَصَوۡاْ رُسُلَهُۥ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ
ayah_translit: watil'ka adun jahadu biayati rabbihim wa'asaw rusulahu wa-ittaba'u amra kulli jabbarin anidin
ayah_english: And this (was) Aad they rejected (the) Signs (of) their Lord and disobeyed His Messengers and followed (the) command (of) every tyrant obstinate

ayah: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ
ayah_translit: wa-ut'bi'u fi hadhihi al-dun'ya la'natan wayawma al-qiyamati ala inna adan kafaru rabbahum ala bu'dan li'adin qawmi hudin
ayah_english: And they were followed in this world (with) a curse and (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection No doubt! Indeed Aad disbelieved their Lord So away with Aad (the) people (of) Hud

ayah: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ

ayah: ۞وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱسۡتَعۡمَرَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوهُ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي قَرِيبٞ مُّجِيبٞ
ayah_translit: wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu huwa ansha-akum mina al-ardi wa-is'ta'marakum fiha fa-is'taghfiruhu thumma tubu ilayhi inna rabbi qaribun mujibun
ayah_english: And to Thamud (We sent) their brother Salih He said O my people! Worship Allah not you have any god other than Him He produced you from the earth and settled you in it So ask forgiveness of Him then turn in repentance to Him Indeed my Lord (is) near All-Responsive

ayah: ۞وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱسۡتَعۡمَرَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوهُ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي قَرِيبٞ مُّجِيبٞ

ayah: ۞وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ هُوَ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱسۡتَعۡمَرَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوهُ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي قَرِيبٞ مُّجِيبٞ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰصَٰلِحُ قَدۡ كُنتَ فِينَا مَرۡجُوّٗا قَبۡلَ هَٰذَآۖ أَتَنۡهَىٰنَآ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَإِنَّنَا لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّا تَدۡعُونَآ إِلَيۡهِ مُرِيبٖ
ayah_translit: qalu yasalihu qad kunta fina marjuwwan qabla hadha atanhana an na'buda ma ya'budu abauna wa-innana lafi shakkin mimma tad'una ilayhi muribin
ayah_english: They said O Salih Verily you were among us the one in whom hope was placed before this Do you forbid us that we worship what worshipped our forefathers And indeed we surely (are) in doubt about what you call us to it suspicious

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰصَٰلِحُ قَدۡ كُنتَ فِينَا مَرۡجُوّٗا قَبۡلَ هَٰذَآۖ أَتَنۡهَىٰنَآ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَإِنَّنَا لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّا تَدۡعُونَآ إِلَيۡهِ مُرِيبٖ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰصَٰلِحُ قَدۡ كُنتَ فِينَا مَرۡجُوّٗا قَبۡلَ هَٰذَآۖ أَتَنۡهَىٰنَآ أَن نَّعۡبُدَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا وَإِنَّنَا لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّمَّا تَدۡعُونَآ إِلَيۡهِ مُرِيبٖ

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَءَاتَىٰنِي مِنۡهُ رَحۡمَةٗ فَمَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُهُۥۖ فَمَا تَزِيدُونَنِي غَيۡرَ تَخۡسِيرٖ
ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi waatani min'hu rahmatan faman yansuruni mina al-lahi in asaytuhu fama tazidunani ghayra takhsirin
ayah_english: He said O my people! Do you see if I am on a clear proof from my Lord and He has given me from Him a Mercy then who (can) help me against Allah if I (were to) disobey Him So not you would increase me but (in) loss

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَءَاتَىٰنِي مِنۡهُ رَحۡمَةٗ فَمَن يَنصُرُنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُهُۥۖ فَمَا تَزِيدُونَنِي غَيۡرَ تَخۡسِيرٖ

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَةٗۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِيٓ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٞ قَرِيبٞ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi hadhihi naqatu al-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi al-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum adhabun qaribun
ayah_english: And O my people! This she-camel (of) Allah (is) for you a Sign so leave her to eat in the earth (of) Allah and (do) not touch her with harm lest will seize you a punishment impending

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَةٗۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ فِيٓ أَرۡضِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٞ قَرِيبٞ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi hadhihi naqatu al-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi al-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum adhabun qaribun
ayah_english: And O my people! This she-camel (of) Allah (is) for you a Sign so leave her to eat in the earth (of) Allah and (do) not touch her with harm lest will seize you a punishment impending

ayah: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَقَالَ تَمَتَّعُواْ فِي دَارِكُمۡ ثَلَٰثَةَ أَيَّامٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ وَعۡدٌ غَيۡرُ مَكۡذُوبٖ
ayah_translit: fa'aqaruha faqala tamatta'u fi darikum thalathata ayyamin dhalika wa'dun ghayru makdhubin
ayah_english: But they hamstrung her So he said Enjoy (yourselves) in your home(s) (for) three days That (is) a promise not (to) be belied

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا صَٰلِحٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَمِنۡ خِزۡيِ يَوۡمِئِذٍۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa amruna najjayna salihan wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wamin khiz'yi yawmi-idhin inna rabbaka huwa al-qawiyu al-'azizu
ayah_english: So when came Our command We saved Salih and those who believed with him by a Mercy from Us and from (the) disgrace (of) that Day Indeed your Lord He (is) All- Strong All-Mighty

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا صَٰلِحٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَمِنۡ خِزۡيِ يَوۡمِئِذٍۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا صَٰلِحٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَمِنۡ خِزۡيِ يَوۡمِئِذٍۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa amruna najjayna salihan wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wamin khiz'yi yawmi-idhin inna rabbaka huwa al-qawiyu al-'azizu
ayah_english: So when came Our command We saved Salih and those who believed with him by a Mercy from Us and from (the) disgrace (of) that Day Indeed your Lord He (is) All- Strong All-Mighty

ayah: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-akhadha alladhina zalamu al-sayhatu fa-asbahu fi diyarihim jathimina
ayah_english: And seized those who wronged the thunderous blast then they became in their homes fallen prone

ayah: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

ayah: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ثَمُودَاْ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّثَمُودَ
ayah_translit: ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha ala inna thamuda kafaru rabbahum ala bu'dan lithamuda
ayah_english: As if not they (had) prospered therein No doubt indeed Thamud disbelieved (in) their Lord so away with Thamud

ayah: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ثَمُودَاْ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّثَمُودَ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ بِٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ قَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞۖ فَمَا لَبِثَ أَن جَآءَ بِعِجۡلٍ حَنِيذٖ
ayah_translit: walaqad jaat rusuluna ib'rahima bil-bush'ra qalu salaman qala salamun fama labitha an jaa bi'ij'lin hanidhin
ayah_english: And certainly came Our messengers (to) Ibrahim with glad tidings they said Peace He said Peace and not he delayed and not he delayed to bring a calf roasted

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَءَآ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ لَا تَصِلُ إِلَيۡهِ نَكِرَهُمۡ وَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۚ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِ لُوطٖ
ayah_translit: falamma raa aydiyahum la tasilu ilayhi nakirahum wa-awjasa min'hum khifatan qalu la takhaf inna ur'sil'na ila qawmi lutin
ayah_english: But when he saw their hands not reaching to it he felt unfamiliar of them and felt apprehension from them [a fear] They said (Do) not fear Indeed we [we] have been sent to (the) people (of) Lut

ayah: فَلَمَّا رَءَآ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ لَا تَصِلُ إِلَيۡهِ نَكِرَهُمۡ وَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۚ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِ لُوطٖ

ayah: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
ayah_translit: wa-im'ra-atuhu qaimatun fadahikat fabasharnaha bi-is'haqa wamin warai is'haqa ya'quba
ayah_english: And his wife (was) standing and she laughed Then We gave her glad tidings of Ishaq and after and after Isaac (of) Yaqub

ayah: قَالَتۡ يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰٓ ءَأَلِدُ وَأَنَا۠ عَجُوزٞ وَهَٰذَا بَعۡلِي شَيۡخًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٞ
ayah_translit: qalat yawaylata a-alidu wa-ana ajuzun wahadha ba'li shaykhan inna hadha lashayon ajibun
ayah_english: She said Woe to me! Shall I bear a child while I am an old woman and this my husband (is) an old man Indeed this (is) surely a thing amazing

ayah: قَالَتۡ يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰٓ ءَأَلِدُ وَأَنَا۠ عَجُوزٞ وَهَٰذَا بَعۡلِي شَيۡخًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٞ

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۖ رَحۡمَتُ ٱللَّهِ وَبَرَكَٰتُهُۥ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ ٱلۡبَيۡتِۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَمِيدٞ مَّجِيدٞ
ayah_translit: qalu ata'jabina min amri al-lahi rahmatu al-lahi wabarakatuhu alaykum ahla al-bayti innahu hamidun majidun
ayah_english: They said Are you amazed at (the) decree of Allah (the) decree of Allah The Mercy of Allah The Mercy of Allah and His blessings (be) upon you people (of) the house Indeed, He (is) All-Praiseworthy All-Glorious

ayah: فَلَمَّا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلرَّوۡعُ وَجَآءَتۡهُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَٰدِلُنَا فِي قَوۡمِ لُوطٍ
ayah_translit: falamma dhahaba an ib'rahima al-raw'u wajaathu al-bush'ra yujadiluna fi qawmi lutin
ayah_english: And when (had) gone away from Ibrahim the fright and had reached him the glad tidings he argued with Us concerning the people of Lut

ayah_translit: inna ib'rahima lahalimun awwahun munibun
ayah_english: Indeed Ibrahim (was) certainly forbearing imploring and oft-returning

ayah: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لَحَلِيمٌ أَوَّـٰهٞ مُّنِيبٞ
ayah_translit: inna ib'rahima lahalimun awwahun munibun
ayah_english: Indeed Ibrahim (was) certainly forbearing imploring and oft-returning

ayah: إِنَّ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ لَحَلِيمٌ أَوَّـٰهٞ مُّنِيبٞ
ayah_translit: inna ib'rahima lahalimun awwahun munibun
ayah_english: Indeed Ibrahim (was) certainly forbearing imploring and oft-returning

ayah: يَـٰٓإِبۡرَٰهِيمُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَٰذَآۖ إِنَّهُۥ قَدۡ جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَإِنَّهُمۡ ءَاتِيهِمۡ عَذَابٌ غَيۡرُ مَرۡدُودٖ
ayah_translit: yaib'rahimu a'rid an hadha innahu qad jaa amru rabbika wa-innahum atihim adhabun ghayru mardudin
ayah_english: O Ibrahim! Turn away from this Indeed it certainly has come (the) Command (of) your Lord and indeed [they] (will) come (for) them a punishment (which) cannot (be) repelled

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُوطٗا سِيٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡعٗا وَقَالَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَصِيبٞ
ayah_translit: walamma jaat rusuluna lutan sia bihim wadaqa bihim dhar'an waqala hadha yawmun asibun
ayah_english: And when came Our messengers (to) Lut he was distressed for them and felt straitened for them (and) uneasy and said This (is) a day distressful

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُوطٗا سِيٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡعٗا وَقَالَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَصِيبٞ

ayah_english: And when came Our messengers (to) Lut he was distressed for them and felt straitened for them (and) uneasy and said This (is) a day distressful

ayah: وَجَآءَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ يُهۡرَعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِي هُنَّ أَطۡهَرُ لَكُمۡۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ فِي ضَيۡفِيٓۖ أَلَيۡسَ مِنكُمۡ رَجُلٞ رَّشِيدٞ
ayah_translit: wajaahu qawmuhu yuh'ra'una ilayhi wamin qablu kanu ya'maluna al-sayiati qala yaqawmi haulai banati hunna atharu lakum fa-ittaqu al-laha wala tukh'zuni fi dayfi alaysa minkum rajulun rashidun
ayah_english: And came (to) him his people rushing to him and before and before they (had) been doing the evil deeds He said O my people These (are) my daughters they (are) purer for you So fear Allah and (do) not disgrace me concerning my guests Is (there) not among you a man right-minded

ayah: وَجَآءَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ يُهۡرَعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِي هُنَّ أَطۡهَرُ لَكُمۡۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ فِي ضَيۡفِيٓۖ أَلَيۡسَ مِنكُمۡ رَجُلٞ رَّشِيدٞ

ayah: وَجَآءَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ يُهۡرَعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِي هُنَّ أَطۡهَرُ لَكُمۡۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ فِي ضَيۡفِيٓۖ أَلَيۡسَ مِنكُمۡ رَجُلٞ رَّشِيدٞ

ayah_english: And came (to) him his people rushing to him and before and before they (had) been doing the evil deeds He said O my people These (are) my daughters they (are) purer for you So fear Allah and (do) not disgrace me concerning my guests Is (there) not among you a man right-minded

ayah: وَجَآءَهُۥ قَوۡمُهُۥ يُهۡرَعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ وَمِن قَبۡلُ كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِي هُنَّ أَطۡهَرُ لَكُمۡۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ فِي ضَيۡفِيٓۖ أَلَيۡسَ مِنكُمۡ رَجُلٞ رَّشِيدٞ

ayah: قَالُواْ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَا لَنَا فِي بَنَاتِكَ مِنۡ حَقّٖ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَعۡلَمُ مَا نُرِيدُ
ayah_translit: qalu laqad alim'ta ma lana fi banatika min haqqin wa-innaka lata'lamu ma nuridu
ayah_english: They said Verily you know (that) not we have concerning your daughters any right And indeed you surely know what we want

ayah: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ
ayah_translit: qala law anna li bikum quwwatan aw awi ila ruk'nin shadidin
ayah_english: He said If that I had over you power or I could take refuge in a support strong

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰلُوطُ إِنَّا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ لَن يَصِلُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكَۖ فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعٖ مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدٌ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَكَۖ إِنَّهُۥ مُصِيبُهَا مَآ أَصَابَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ مَوۡعِدَهُمُ ٱلصُّبۡحُۚ أَلَيۡسَ ٱلصُّبۡحُ بِقَرِيبٖ
ayah_translit: qalu yalutu inna rusulu rabbika lan yasilu ilayka fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'in mina al-layli wala yaltafit minkum ahadun illa im'ra-ataka innahu musibuha ma asabahum inna maw'idahumu al-sub'hu alaysa al-sub'hu biqaribin
ayah_english: They said O Lut Indeed, we (are) messengers (of) your Lord never they will reach you So travel with your family in a part of the night and (let) not look back anyone of you anyone of you except your wife Indeed, it will strike her what will strike them Indeed their appointed time (is) morning Is not the morning near

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰلُوطُ إِنَّا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ لَن يَصِلُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكَۖ فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِطۡعٖ مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِنكُمۡ أَحَدٌ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَكَۖ إِنَّهُۥ مُصِيبُهَا مَآ أَصَابَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ مَوۡعِدَهُمُ ٱلصُّبۡحُۚ أَلَيۡسَ ٱلصُّبۡحُ بِقَرِيبٖ

ayah_english: They said O Lut Indeed, we (are) messengers (of) your Lord never they will reach you So travel with your family in a part of the night and (let) not look back anyone of you anyone of you except your wife Indeed, it will strike her what will strike them Indeed their appointed time (is) morning Is not the morning near

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا جَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ مَّنضُودٖ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa amruna ja'alna aliyaha safilaha wa-amtarna alayha hijaratan min sijjilin mandudin
ayah_english: So when came Our Command We made its upside its downside and We rained upon them stones of baked clay (in) layers

ayah_translit: musawwamatan inda rabbika wama hiya mina al-zalimina biba'idin

ayah: ۞وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ وَلَا تَنقُصُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُم بِخَيۡرٖ وَإِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٖ مُّحِيطٖ
ayah_translit: wa-ila madyana akhahum shu'ayban qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu wala tanqusu al-mik'yala wal-mizana inni arakum bikhayrin wa-inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin muhitin
ayah_english: And to Madyan their brother Shuaib He said O my people! Worship Allah not (is) for you any god other than Him And (do) not decrease (from) the measure and the scale Indeed I see you in prosperity but indeed I fear for you punishment (of ) a Day all-encompassing

ayah: ۞وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥۖ وَلَا تَنقُصُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَرَىٰكُم بِخَيۡرٖ وَإِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٖ مُّحِيطٖ

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi awfu al-mik'yala wal-mizana bil-qis'ti wala tabkhasu al-nasa ashyaahum wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
ayah_english: And O my people! Give full measure and weight in justice and (do) not deprive the people (of) their things and (do) not act wickedly in the earth spreading corruption

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi awfu al-mik'yala wal-mizana bil-qis'ti wala tabkhasu al-nasa ashyaahum wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
ayah_english: And O my people! Give full measure and weight in justice and (do) not deprive the people (of) their things and (do) not act wickedly in the earth spreading corruption

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡمِكۡيَالَ وَٱلۡمِيزَانَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ

ayah_english: And O my people! Give full measure and weight in justice and (do) not deprive the people (of) their things and (do) not act wickedly in the earth spreading corruption

ayah: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ
ayah_translit: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minina wama ana alaykum bihafizin
ayah_english: (What) remains (from) Allah (is) best for you if you are believers And not I am over you a guardian

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ أَصَلَوٰتُكَ تَأۡمُرُكَ أَن نَّتۡرُكَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَآ أَوۡ أَن نَّفۡعَلَ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِنَا مَا نَشَـٰٓؤُاْۖ إِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ ٱلۡحَلِيمُ ٱلرَّشِيدُ
ayah_translit: qalu yashu'aybu asalatuka tamuruka an natruka ma ya'budu abauna aw an naf 'ala fi amwalina ma nashau innaka la-anta al-halimu al-rashidu
ayah_english: They said O Shuaib! Does your prayer command you that we leave what worship our forefathers or that we do concerning our wealth what we will Indeed you surely you (are) the forbearing the right-minded

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ أَصَلَوٰتُكَ تَأۡمُرُكَ أَن نَّتۡرُكَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَآ أَوۡ أَن نَّفۡعَلَ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِنَا مَا نَشَـٰٓؤُاْۖ إِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ ٱلۡحَلِيمُ ٱلرَّشِيدُ

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ أَصَلَوٰتُكَ تَأۡمُرُكَ أَن نَّتۡرُكَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَآ أَوۡ أَن نَّفۡعَلَ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِنَا مَا نَشَـٰٓؤُاْۖ إِنَّكَ لَأَنتَ ٱلۡحَلِيمُ ٱلرَّشِيدُ
ayah_translit: qalu yashu'aybu asalatuka tamuruka an natruka ma ya'budu abauna aw an naf 'ala fi amwalina ma nashau innaka la-anta al-halimu al-rashidu

ayah_english: They said O Shuaib! Does your prayer command you that we leave what worship our forefathers or that we do concerning our wealth what we will Indeed you surely you (are) the forbearing the right-minded

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَرَزَقَنِي مِنۡهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُخَالِفَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنۡهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُۚ إِنۡ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا ٱلۡإِصۡلَٰحَ مَا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُۚ وَمَا تَوۡفِيقِيٓ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ
ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi warazaqani min'hu riz'qan hasanan wama uridu an ukhalifakum ila ma anhakum anhu in uridu illa al-is'laha ma is'tata'tu wama tawfiqi illa bil-lahi alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unibu
ayah_english: He said O my people Do you see if I am on a clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me from Himself a good provision a good provision And not I intend that I differ from you in what I forbid you from it Not I intend except the reform as much as I am able as much as I am able And not (is) my success except with Allah Upon Him I trust and to Him I turn

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَرَزَقَنِي مِنۡهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُخَالِفَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنۡهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُۚ إِنۡ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا ٱلۡإِصۡلَٰحَ مَا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُۚ وَمَا تَوۡفِيقِيٓ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كُنتُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّي وَرَزَقَنِي مِنۡهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُخَالِفَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ مَآ أَنۡهَىٰكُمۡ عَنۡهُۚ إِنۡ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا ٱلۡإِصۡلَٰحَ مَا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُۚ وَمَا تَوۡفِيقِيٓ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُنِيبُ
ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi ara-aytum in kuntu ala bayyinatin min rabbi warazaqani min'hu riz'qan hasanan wama uridu an ukhalifakum ila ma anhakum anhu in uridu illa al-is'laha ma is'tata'tu wama tawfiqi illa bil-lahi alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi unibu
ayah_english: He said O my people Do you see if I am on a clear evidence from my Lord and He has provided me from Himself a good provision a good provision And not I intend that I differ from you in what I forbid you from it Not I intend except the reform as much as I am able as much as I am able And not (is) my success except with Allah Upon Him I trust and to Him I turn
word_tranlation: as much as I am able

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ لَا يَجۡرِمَنَّكُمۡ شِقَاقِيٓ أَن يُصِيبَكُم مِّثۡلُ مَآ أَصَابَ قَوۡمَ نُوحٍ أَوۡ قَوۡمَ هُودٍ أَوۡ قَوۡمَ صَٰلِحٖۚ وَمَا قَوۡمُ لُوطٖ مِّنكُم بِبَعِيدٖ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi la yajrimannakum shiqaqi an yusibakum mith'lu ma asaba qawma nuhin aw qawma hudin aw qawma salihin wama qawmu lutin minkum biba'idin
ayah_english: And O my people (Let) not cause you to sin (Let) not cause you to sin my dissension lest befalls you similar (to) what befell (the) people of Nuh or (the) people of Hud or (the) people of Salih And not (are the) people of Lut from you far off

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ لَا يَجۡرِمَنَّكُمۡ شِقَاقِيٓ أَن يُصِيبَكُم مِّثۡلُ مَآ أَصَابَ قَوۡمَ نُوحٍ أَوۡ قَوۡمَ هُودٍ أَوۡ قَوۡمَ صَٰلِحٖۚ وَمَا قَوۡمُ لُوطٖ مِّنكُم بِبَعِيدٖ

ayah: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي رَحِيمٞ وَدُودٞ
ayah_translit: wa-is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi inna rabbi rahimun wadudun
ayah_english: And ask forgiveness (of) your Lord then turn in repentance to Him Indeed my Lord (is) Most Merciful Most Loving

ayah_english: And ask forgiveness (of) your Lord then turn in repentance to Him Indeed my Lord (is) Most Merciful Most Loving

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ مَا نَفۡقَهُ كَثِيرٗا مِّمَّا تَقُولُ وَإِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِينَا ضَعِيفٗاۖ وَلَوۡلَا رَهۡطُكَ لَرَجَمۡنَٰكَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡنَا بِعَزِيزٖ
ayah_translit: qalu yashu'aybu ma nafqahu kathiran mimma taqulu wa-inna lanaraka fina da'ifan walawla rahtuka larajamnaka wama anta alayna bi'azizin
ayah_english: They said O Shuaib Not we understand much of what you say and indeed, we surely [we] see you among us weak And if not for your family surely we would have stoned you and you are not and you are not against us mighty

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰشُعَيۡبُ مَا نَفۡقَهُ كَثِيرٗا مِّمَّا تَقُولُ وَإِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِينَا ضَعِيفٗاۖ وَلَوۡلَا رَهۡطُكَ لَرَجَمۡنَٰكَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡنَا بِعَزِيزٖ

ayah: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَرَهۡطِيٓ أَعَزُّ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱتَّخَذۡتُمُوهُ وَرَآءَكُمۡ ظِهۡرِيًّاۖ إِنَّ رَبِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطٞ
ayah_translit: qala yaqawmi arahti a'azzu alaykum mina al-lahi wa-ittakhadhtumuhu waraakum zih'riyyan inna rabbi bima ta'maluna muhitun
ayah_english: He said O my people! Is my family mightier on you than Allah And you have taken Him behind your backs Indeed my Lord of what you do (is) All-Encompassing

ayah_english: He said O my people! Is my family mightier on you than Allah And you have taken Him behind your backs Indeed my Lord of what you do (is) All-Encompassing

ayah: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنِّي عَٰمِلٞۖ سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَن يَأۡتِيهِ عَذَابٞ يُخۡزِيهِ وَمَنۡ هُوَ كَٰذِبٞۖ وَٱرۡتَقِبُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُمۡ رَقِيبٞ
ayah_translit: wayaqawmi i'malu ala makanatikum inni amilun sawfa ta'lamuna man yatihi adhabun yukh'zihi waman huwa kadhibun wa-ir'taqibu inni ma'akum raqibun
ayah_english: And O my people! Work (according) to your position indeed I am working Soon you will know (on) whom will come a punishment (that will) disgrace him and who [he] (is) a liar And watch indeed I am with you a watcher

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا شُعَيۡبٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَأَخَذَتِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
ayah_translit: walamma jaa amruna najjayna shu'ayban wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu birahmatin minna wa-akhadhati alladhina zalamu al-sayhatu fa-asbahu fi diyarihim jathimina
ayah_english: And when came Our Command We saved Shuaib and those who believed with him by a Mercy from Us And seized those who wronged the thunderous blast then they became in their homes fallen prone

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا شُعَيۡبٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَأَخَذَتِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

ayah: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا شُعَيۡبٗا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَأَخَذَتِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

ayah: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ
ayah_translit: ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha ala bu'dan limadyana kama ba'idat thamudu
ayah_english: As if not they (had) prospered therein So away with Madyan as was taken away the Thamud

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayah_translit: walaqad arsalna musa biayatina wasul'tanin mubinin
ayah_english: And certainly We sent Musa with Our Signs and an authority clear

ayah: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَ فِرۡعَوۡنَۖ وَمَآ أَمۡرُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِرَشِيدٖ
ayah_translit: ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fa-ittaba'u amra fir'awna wama amru fir'awna birashidin
ayah_english: To Firaun and his chiefs but they followed (the) command Firaun and not (the) command Firaun was right

ayah_translit: ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fa-ittaba'u amra fir'awna wama amru fir'awna birashidin

ayah: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ
ayah_translit: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyamati fa-awradahumu al-nara wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrudu
ayah_english: He will precede his people (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection and lead them (into) the Fire And wretched (is) the place to which (they are) led

ayah: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِۦ لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلرِّفۡدُ ٱلۡمَرۡفُودُ
ayah_translit: wa-ut'bi'u fi hadhihi la'natan wayawma al-qiyamati bi'sa al-rif'du al-marfudu
ayah_english: And they were followed in this (by) a curse and (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection Wretched (is) the gift which (will) be given

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ
ayah_translit: dhalika min anbai al-qura naqussuhu alayka min'ha qaimun wahasidun
ayah_english: That (is) from (the) news (of) the cities (which) We relate to you of them some are standing and (some) mown

ayah: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡۖ فَمَآ أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِي يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمۡ غَيۡرَ تَتۡبِيبٖ
ayah_translit: wama zalamnahum walakin zalamu anfusahum fama aghnat anhum alihatuhumu allati yad'una min duni al-lahi min shayin lamma jaa amru rabbika wama zaduhum ghayra tatbibin
ayah_english: And not We wronged them but they wronged themselves So not availed them their gods which they invoked other than Allah other than Allah other than Allah any thing when came (the) command (of) your Lord And not they increased them other than ruin

ayah: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡۖ فَمَآ أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِي يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمۡ غَيۡرَ تَتۡبِيبٖ

ayah: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡۖ فَمَآ أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِي يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمۡ غَيۡرَ تَتۡبِيبٖ

ayah_english: And not We wronged them but they wronged themselves So not availed them their gods which they invoked other than Allah other than Allah other than Allah any thing when came (the) command (of) your Lord And not they increased them other than ruin

ayah: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡۖ فَمَآ أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ ٱلَّتِي يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن شَيۡءٖ لَّمَّا جَآءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمۡ غَيۡرَ تَتۡبِيبٖ

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذَآ أَخَذَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَهِيَ ظَٰلِمَةٌۚ إِنَّ أَخۡذَهُۥٓ أَلِيمٞ شَدِيدٌ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika akhdhu rabbika idha akhadha al-qura wahiya zalimatun inna akhdhahu alimun shadidun
ayah_english: And thus (is) the seizure (of) your Lord when He seizes the cities while they (are) doing wrong Indeed His seizure (is) painful (and) severe

ayah_translit: wakadhalika akhdhu rabbika idha akhadha al-qura wahiya zalimatun inna akhdhahu alimun shadidun

ayah: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ
ayah_translit: inna fi dhalika laayatan liman khafa adhaba al-akhirati dhalika yawmun majmu'un lahu al-nasu wadhalika yawmun mashhudun
ayah_english: Indeed in that (is) surely a Sign for (those) who fear (the) punishment (of) the Hereafter That (is) a Day (will) be gathered on it the mankind and that (is) a Day witnessed

ayah_translit: wama nu-akhiruhu illa li-ajalin ma'dudin
ayah_english: And not We delay it except for a term limited

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِيّٞ وَسَعِيدٞ
ayah_translit: yawma yati la takallamu nafsun illa bi-idh'nihi famin'hum shaqiyyun wasa'idun
ayah_english: (The) Day (it) comes not will speak a soul except by His leave Then among them (will be the) wretched and (the) glad

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِيّٞ وَسَعِيدٞ
ayah_translit: yawma yati la takallamu nafsun illa bi-idh'nihi famin'hum shaqiyyun wasa'idun

ayah: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ
ayah_translit: fa-amma alladhina shaqu fafi al-nari lahum fiha zafirun washahiqun
ayah_english: As for those who were wretched then (they will be) in the Fire For them therein (is) sighing and wailing

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha ma damati al-samawatu wal-ardu illa ma shaa rabbuka inna rabbaka fa'alun lima yuridu
ayah_english: (Will be) abiding therein as long as remain as long as remain the heavens and the earth except what your Lord wills what your Lord wills what your Lord wills Indeed your Lord (is) All-Accomplisher of what He intends

ayah: ۞وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ سُعِدُواْ فَفِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۖ عَطَآءً غَيۡرَ مَجۡذُوذٖ
ayah_translit: wa-amma alladhina su'idu fafi al-janati khalidina fiha ma damati al-samawatu wal-ardu illa ma shaa rabbuka ataan ghayra majdhudhin
ayah_english: And as for those who were glad then (they will be) in Paradise (will be) abiding therein as long as remains as long as remains the heavens and the earth except what your Lord wills what your Lord wills what your Lord wills a bestowal not interrupted

ayah_english: And as for those who were glad then (they will be) in Paradise (will be) abiding therein as long as remains as long as remains the heavens and the earth except what your Lord wills what your Lord wills what your Lord wills a bestowal not interrupted

ayah: فَلَا تَكُ فِي مِرۡيَةٖ مِّمَّا يَعۡبُدُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِۚ مَا يَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَابَآؤُهُم مِّن قَبۡلُۚ وَإِنَّا لَمُوَفُّوهُمۡ نَصِيبَهُمۡ غَيۡرَ مَنقُوصٖ
ayah_translit: fala taku fi mir'yatin mimma ya'budu haulai ma ya'buduna illa kama ya'budu abauhum min qablu wa-inna lamuwaffuhum nasibahum ghayra manqusin
ayah_english: So (do) not be in doubt as to what worship these (polytheists) Not they worship except as what worshipped their forefathers before before And indeed, We will surely pay them in full their share without being diminished

ayah_translit: fala taku fi mir'yatin mimma ya'budu haulai ma ya'buduna illa kama ya'budu abauhum min qablu wa-inna lamuwaffuhum nasibahum ghayra manqusin
ayah_english: So (do) not be in doubt as to what worship these (polytheists) Not they worship except as what worshipped their forefathers before before And indeed, We will surely pay them in full their share without being diminished

ayah_english: So (do) not be in doubt as to what worship these (polytheists) Not they worship except as what worshipped their forefathers before before And indeed, We will surely pay them in full their share without being diminished

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ فَٱخۡتُلِفَ فِيهِۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَفِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهُ مُرِيبٖ
ayah_translit: walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fa-ukh'tulifa fihi walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum wa-innahum lafi shakkin min'hu muribin
ayah_english: And verily We gave Musa the Book but differences arose therein And if not (for) a Word (that) preceded from your Lord surely would have been judged between them And indeed they surely (are) in doubt concerning it suspicious

ayah: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wa-inna kullan lamma layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka a'malahum innahu bima ya'maluna khabirun
ayah_english: And indeed to each [when] to each [when] surely will pay them in full your Lord their deeds Indeed, He of what they do (is) All-Aware

ayah: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

ayah: فَٱسۡتَقِمۡ كَمَآ أُمِرۡتَ وَمَن تَابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَطۡغَوۡاْۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: fa-is'taqim kama umir'ta waman taba ma'aka wala tatghaw innahu bima ta'maluna basirun
ayah_english: So stand firm as you are commanded and (those) who turn (in repentance) with you and (do) not transgress Indeed He of what you do (is) All-Seer

ayah: وَلَا تَرۡكَنُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wala tarkanu ila alladhina zalamu fatamassakumu al-naru wama lakum min duni al-lahi min awliyaa thumma la tunsaruna
ayah_english: And (do) not incline to those who do wrong lest touches you the Fire and not (is) for you besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah any protectors then not you will be helped

ayah: وَلَا تَرۡكَنُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ
ayah_translit: wala tarkanu ila alladhina zalamu fatamassakumu al-naru wama lakum min duni al-lahi min awliyaa thumma la tunsaruna
ayah_english: And (do) not incline to those who do wrong lest touches you the Fire and not (is) for you besides Allah besides Allah besides Allah any protectors then not you will be helped

ayah: وَلَا تَرۡكَنُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ

ayah: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَيِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡحَسَنَٰتِ يُذۡهِبۡنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلذَّـٰكِرِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-aqimi al-salata tarafayi al-nahari wazulafan mina al-layli inna al-hasanati yudh'hib'na al-sayiati dhalika dhik'ra lildhakirina
ayah_english: And establish the prayer (at the) two ends (of) the day and (at) the approach of the night Indeed the good deeds remove the evil deeds That (is) a reminder for those who remember

ayah: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَيِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡحَسَنَٰتِ يُذۡهِبۡنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلذَّـٰكِرِينَ

ayah: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-is'bir fa-inna al-laha la yudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
ayah_english: And be patient for indeed Allah (does) not let go waste (the) reward (of) the good-doers

ayah: وَٱصۡبِرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
