ayah: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ أُوْلُواْ بَقِيَّةٖ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡفَسَادِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ أَنجَيۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَآ أُتۡرِفُواْ فِيهِ وَكَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: falawla kana mina al-quruni min qablikum ulu baqiyyatin yanhawna ani al-fasadi fi al-ardi illa qalilan mimman anjayna min'hum wa-ittaba'a alladhina zalamu ma ut'rifu fihi wakanu muj'rimina
ayah_english: So why not had been of the generations before you before you those possessing a remnant those possessing a remnant forbidding from the corruption in the earth except a few of those We saved among them But followed those who did wrong what luxury they were given therein and they were criminals

ayah: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ أُوْلُواْ بَقِيَّةٖ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡفَسَادِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ أَنجَيۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَآ أُتۡرِفُواْ فِيهِ وَكَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ

ayah: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِن قَبۡلِكُمۡ أُوْلُواْ بَقِيَّةٖ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡفَسَادِ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ أَنجَيۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱتَّبَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مَآ أُتۡرِفُواْ فِيهِ وَكَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
ayah_translit: falawla kana mina al-quruni min qablikum ulu baqiyyatin yanhawna ani al-fasadi fi al-ardi illa qalilan mimman anjayna min'hum wa-ittaba'a alladhina zalamu ma ut'rifu fihi wakanu muj'rimina

ayah_translit: falawla kana mina al-quruni min qablikum ulu baqiyyatin yanhawna ani al-fasadi fi al-ardi illa qalilan mimman anjayna min'hum wa-ittaba'a alladhina zalamu ma ut'rifu fihi wakanu muj'rimina

ayah: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ
ayah_translit: wama kana rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qura bizul'min wa-ahluha mus'lihuna
ayah_english: And not would your Lord destroy the cities unjustly while its people (were) reformers

ayah: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ
ayah_translit: walaw shaa rabbuka laja'ala al-nasa ummatan wahidatan wala yazaluna mukh'talifina
ayah_english: And if your Lord (had) willed your Lord (had) willed surely He (could) have made the mankind one community one community but not they will cease to differ

ayah: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡۗ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: illa man rahima rabbuka walidhalika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nasi ajma'ina
ayah_english: Except (on) whom your Lord has bestowed Mercy your Lord has bestowed Mercy and for that He created them And will be fulfilled (the) Word of your Lord (the) Word of your Lord Surely I will fill Hell with the Jinn and the men all together

ayah: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡۗ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: illa man rahima rabbuka walidhalika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nasi ajma'ina
ayah_english: Except (on) whom your Lord has bestowed Mercy your Lord has bestowed Mercy and for that He created them And will be fulfilled (the) Word of your Lord (the) Word of your Lord Surely I will fill Hell with the Jinn and the men all together

ayah: وَكُلّٗا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: wakullan naqussu alayka min anbai al-rusuli ma nuthabbitu bihi fuadaka wajaaka fi hadhihi al-haqu wamaw'izatun wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
ayah_english: And each We relate to you of (the) news (of) the Messengers (for) that We may make firm with it your heart And has come to you in this the truth and an admonition and a reminder for the believers

ayah: وَكُلّٗا نَّقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلرُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِهِۦ فُؤَادَكَۚ وَجَآءَكَ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَوۡعِظَةٞ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ
ayah_translit: waqul lilladhina la yu'minuna i'malu ala makanatikum inna amiluna
ayah_english: And say to those who (do) not believe Work (according) to your position indeed we (are also) working

ayah: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-intaziru inna muntaziruna
ayah_english: And wait indeed we (are) ones who wait

ayah: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-intaziru inna muntaziruna
ayah_english: And wait indeed we (are) ones who wait

ayah: وَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-intaziru inna muntaziruna
ayah_english: And wait indeed we (are) ones who wait

ayah: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعۡبُدۡهُ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَيۡهِۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: walillahi ghaybu al-samawati wal-ardi wa-ilayhi yur'ja'u al-amru kulluhu fa-u'bud'hu watawakkal alayhi wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ta'maluna
ayah_english: And for Allah (is the) unseen (of) the heavens and the earth and to Him will be returned the matter all (of) it so worship Him and put your trust upon Him And your Lord is not And your Lord is not unaware of what you do

ayah: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعۡبُدۡهُ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَيۡهِۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: walillahi ghaybu al-samawati wal-ardi wa-ilayhi yur'ja'u al-amru kulluhu fa-u'bud'hu watawakkal alayhi wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ta'maluna
ayah_english: And for Allah (is the) unseen (of) the heavens and the earth and to Him will be returned the matter all (of) it so worship Him and put your trust upon Him And your Lord is not And your Lord is not unaware of what you do

ayah: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ كُلُّهُۥ فَٱعۡبُدۡهُ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَيۡهِۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ
